item.title: 分布式编程第一周课堂笔记
item.description: 本笔记来自课堂记录和课程网站的总结，转载请注明出处! Introduction to MapReduce Lecture Summary: In this lecture, we learned the MapReduce paradigm, which is a pattern of parallel functional programming that has been very successful in enabling “big data” computations. The input to a MapReduce style computation is a set of key-value pairs.
